channel.title: Please create a TOL Social Hierarchy - IMPORTANT CHANGE
channel.description:
Just going to say, I have a major suggestion. I feel it is a cosmetic thing that needs to be change. Instead of giving basically everyone (besides guides and Barrons as I have seen probs more, but most of the people are squire) the squire role the developers allow for gold points for people to buy new names. Such as lord and other royalty names. Like thing about the European feudalism social hierarchy and generate some names and such. Maybe even look at the Japanese feudalism social hierarchy and look at there levels if you really hate the European ones. In my opinion, this is a huge thing that needs to be changed and should be one of the developers priorities. Take my suggestion thanks.
![image|471x500](upload://oVOlvY3C8C5msouAARMMRSgdv6u.jpeg) Japanese feudalism social classes
![image|680x500](upload://reVAVwfgaUY1q3gSEwvOCFuWbAz.jpeg) European plebs social classes
_These images are for people who haven’t taken world history yet and are thinking what in the world is feudalism_
